column1: al-ṣan‘ah. tkhlīl basīṭ. mashriqī. qaṣīdah. basīṭ

column2: abshir laqad nilt mā tarjū watantaẓir

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. mashriqī. qaṣīdah. ṭawīl lil’mām al-shāfi‘ī

column2: idhā lam yakun maḥḍ al-widād ṭabī‘atan
column3: falā khayr fī wuddin yakūn takallufā

column2: walā khayr fī khillin yakhūn khalīlah
